name: Tropical Spotted Fever
chief_complaint: I've had high fever with red spots all over my body for 5 days, and my joints ache terribly
prognosis: Excellent with prompt treatment, though fatigue may persist for weeks. Untreated cases risk severe complications including meningoencephalitis.
description: An acute febrile illness caused by Rickettsia africae transmitted through Amblyomma tick bites. Endemic in sub-Saharan Africa and increasingly reported in returning travelers. Characterized by eschar at bite site (absent in 40% of cases), fever, and distinctive spotted rash.
risk_factors: exposure to cattle or game animals
